T03kamvchtu:130: (buddhaḥ) kathaṃ kuryāditi? tathā āryadharmasaṃgītau api bhāṣitam
T03kamvchtu:133: satyamevaitat tathāpi yadi bhagavataḥ sa kāyo na

T03kamvchtu:354: tāvat prasiddhe nairātmyavādināṃ yuṣmākaṃ mate tu yastadādhāra ekaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa nāsti kaściditi kastāvadādhāraḥ? vijñānakṣaṇānāṃ pratikṣāṇaṃ pṛthaktvāt |
T03kamvchtu:355: baddho (Vajraṭ_115) devadattaḥ muktaścānyo yajñadatta iti naiva vyavasthā, na cānyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ
T03kamvchtu:359: hi- kartṛtvena prajñapto yo hi vijñānakṣaṇaḥ, tasya phalenānabhisambandhāt kṛtavipraṇāśākhyo doṣaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:360: akartuścaiva tasya phalena yogādakṛtābhyāgamo doṣaḥ syāt |
T03kamvchtu:361: smṛtyādikaṃ a bhinnādhikaraṇakamiti na loke pratītam |
T03kamvchtu:364: devadattasya cittānubhavaḥ yajñadattacittena na smaryate vā pratyabhijñāyate vā |
T03kamvchtu:365: yenānubhūyate tenaiva smaryate pratyabhijñāyate veti prasiddham |
T03kamvchtu:367: prayogaḥ- yau bandhamokṣau tāvekādhikaraṇakau, yathā- devadattasyaiva śṛṅkhalābandhanaṃ mokṣaśca |
T03kamvchtu:370: tatra yadi svatantrasyaikasya paramārthasato nityasya puruṣasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā tathāvidhena puruṣeṇa saha kvāpi hetoḥ sambandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam, sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt,
T03kamvchtu:375: api ca, yadā yatra santāne 'vidyādikaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ pravartate, tadā sa baddhaḥ ityucaryate, sa eva punaḥ
T03kamvchtu:377: ubhāvapi tau bandhamokṣau nityaikaparamārthavastuviṣayakau natarāṃ siddhau |
T03kamvchtu:379: yasmin santāne śubhoo vā aśubho vā cittānubhavaḥ samutpadyate, tasminneva kālāntare santatiparipākamāgamya
T03kamvchtu:380: mastuluṅgalākṣādirasāvasiktasantatiparipāka iva sukha-duḥkha-smṛtyādiphalodayo dṛṣṭāḥ, tasmācchubhādīnāmekādhikaraṇatvaṃ tāvat prasiddham |
T03kamvchtu:381: naiva khalu kaścidekaḥ kartā bhoktā smartā vā |
T03kamvchtu:383: na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, niyatasāmarthyavato bījāderiva kāraṇaśakteḥ pratiniyatatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:384: tataśca yeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratiniyataḥ teṣu naiva kaścid eko 'nugataḥ bhinnāvasthaśca paridṛśyate |
T03kamvchtu:386: ātmopacārasya yā khalu kartrādyavasthā, sā tāvad hetuḥ, yā khalu bhoktrādyavasthā, sā phalamityevaṃvidho hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vaśyamabhyupetavya iti |
T03kamvchtu:387: anyathā tayorubhayorapyavasthayoranupapannatve parasparokārakatvābhāve vā ākāśamiva kathaṃ tāvat tāvat sidhyet bhoktrādiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:390: itthaṃ pratiniyatātmanā sambandhena sukhādīnāṃ sambhavaḥ na tu sarvatra |
T03kamvchtu:391: ataḥ (Vajraṭ_117) kāryakāraṇabhāvena dṛśyamānāni kuśalādīnyeva kartā, bhoktā ca syāt, kimanenādṛṣṭasvabhāvena ātmanā parikalpitena |
T03kamvchtu:392: atha nānumānena ātmā siddhaḥ syāt, tathāpi pratyaviṣayatvād ahaṃbuddheḥ
T03kamvchtu:393: pratyakṣata evātmā sidhyatīti cet? tadapi tāvanna yujyate, bhrāntatvāt savikalpatvād asiddhatvācca pratyakṣeṇa tatrāhaṃbuddheriti |
T03kamvchtu:394: ahaṃbuddhau pratīyamānatve yathā khalu pratyakṣa eko nityo vibhuścātmā svasiddhāntairukalpyate tathā naivopalabhyata ityavaśyameva draṣṭavyam |
T03kamvchtu:395: anyathā ahaṃbuddheryadi pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt tadā vivādamāneṣu tāvannaiva pravarteta ātmaviṣaye kaścana vivādaḥ, savikalpāyā
T03kamvchtu:398: anādikālābhyāsavaśāt pratinīyateṣu rūpādiskandheṣu ekatvamadhyāropya paraṃ vyāvarttīyatumahamiti pratītiḥ, tasyāṃ pratītau teṣāmeva rūpādīnāṃ pratibhāsamānatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:399: kāye cāyamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama deha iti bhedamātragrahaṇamiti
T03kamvchtu:401: yadi cātmani ayamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama ātmā iti cintyate |
T03kamvchtu:403: bhedāntaraparihāreṇa tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ śilāputrakasya śarīravad bhedopacāreṇa grahaṇānnāsti virodha iti cet? dehālambane 'pi caitat samānam |
T03kamvchtu:404: ātmā khalu viṣayaḥ punaḥ kramotpattyā virudhyata iti paścāt vakṣyate |
T03kamvchtu:405: na kevalamātmagraha ātmā apitu tadviṣayo rūpādirātmāstītyapi vaktuṃ na śakyate, tadavilakṣaṇatvāttasya
T03kamvchtu:406: krameṇopalabhyamānatvānna te ekasvabhāvāḥ, na ca svatantrāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:408: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā |
T03kamvchtu:411: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam |
T03kamvchtu:413: skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:415: ataḥ skandheṣveva ātmeti prajñapyate, na tāvannāmni vivādaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:416: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādināsambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam
T03kamvchtu:418: sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā, muktaḥ saṃsārī vāpi na yujyate,
T03kamvchtu:420: ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:421: na cāyamasiddho hetuḥ, tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam |
T03kamvchtu:428: sthiteḥ sthāturabhinnatvāt, tasyaiva kārakatvamiti? tadapi tāvanniṣidhyate |
T03kamvchtu:429: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:432: svayaṃ bhaṅgātmanaḥ tāvannāsti kaścana sthāpakaḥ, anavasthitatvāttasya, anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam |
T03kamvchtu:438: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ, sarvasya svayamavasthitatvāt lauhaśalākāvat |
T03kamvchtu:439: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet, tadā saṃyogaikatvameva syāt, aviśiṣṭatvena pratiniyatātmabhiḥ sukhādibhirnaiva syāt sambandhaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:440: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā |
T03kamvchtu:442: balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat
T03kamvchtu:444: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ na cāpi kāryakāraṇasambandhaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:446: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ, aviśiṣṭatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:449: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
T03kamvchtu:450: tatsvabhāvāparityāgāt, parityāge vā kathaṃ nityaḥ syāt |
T03kamvchtu:451: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti |
T03kamvchtu:452: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā? atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā? kiñca kāpilaparikalpitasya (atmanaḥ) (Vajraṭ_120) sukhādibhirākāśavannirvikāratvena naiva khalu
T03kamvchtu:455: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā, atiprasaṅgāt |
T03kamvchtu:459: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvastāvadanityeṣveva sambhavati, na khalu nityeṣu |
T03kamvchtu:460: teṣu nāsti kasyacidapi kāryasya krameṇotpādasāmarthyam, yathoktaṃ prāk |
T03kamvchtu:461: na cāpi yugapad, tathāvidhaphalotpādasamarthasvabhāvānugame phalotpādābhāvastāvanna yujyate prāgvat |
T03kamvchtu:463: | kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ vyatirikto nāstyeva kaścidākārāntaraḥ, yaḥ syādarthakriyāyāṃ prabhuviṣṇuḥ, parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāttayoḥ |
T03kamvchtu:464: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti |
T03kamvchtu:468: evaṃvidhe sarvasāmarthyaśūnye śaśaviṣāṇādyaviśeṣe 'pi 'bhāvaḥ'; iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:469: tathāpi arthakriyārthino hi prekṣāvantaḥ (Vajraṭ_121) tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ |
T03kamvchtu:474: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran, sarvasaṃskṛtānāṃ skandhasaṃgṛhītatvāt
T03kamvchtu:475: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo
T03kamvchtu:483: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi |
T03kamvchtu:486: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram |
T03kamvchtu:487: tatrāmiṣadānena dānapāramitā nirdiṣṭā, abhayadānena tāvad śīla-kṣāntipāramite, dharmadānena tu vīrya-dhyāna-prajñāpāramitāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:490: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet |
T03kamvchtu:493: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam
T03kamvchtu:496: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam
T03kamvchtu:497: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam |
T03kamvchtu:502: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ, arthāntareṇa jñānena grahaṇāyogāt |
T03kamvchtu:503: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:506: anekatvaṃ tāvanna yujyata eva, ekaikaparamāṇugrāhyajñānānubhavābhāvānna sidhyati tāvajjñānasyaikatvam, tadasiddhāvanekatvamapi khalvasiddham,
T03kamvchtu:508: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati, amūrttatvājjñānānām |
T03kamvchtu:509: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā |
T03kamvchtu:516: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:517: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ, nīlākārātmano jñānasya svasaṃviditatvāt
T03kamvchtu:519: yattad vijñānaṃ tadevārthagrāhakamiti cet? bhavatu nāma prajñaptitaḥ, na tu paramārthatastad vedanam, ātmākārasya svasaṃviditatvāt,
T03kamvchtu:521: svākārādhānena tāvadutpādako heturnaiva niyamena sidhyati, vyabhicārāt |
T03kamvchtu:523: na ca saṃhitāḥ, tebhyo 'narthāntaratvāt vikalpaviṣayāṇām asattvācca |
T03kamvchtu:526: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ |
T03kamvchtu:528: bhāvamātreṇa vedane sati sarvaiḥ sarvavedanaprasaṅgaḥ, aviśiṣṭatvāt sarvasya |
T03kamvchtu:530: nīlasaṃvedanamidam, na pītamiti vyavasthā na syāt, vyavasthāyāḥ kasyāpi hetuviśeṣasyābhāvāt
T03kamvchtu:531: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:532: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt |
T03kamvchtu:534: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati, tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati,
T03kamvchtu:536: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ |
T03kamvchtu:539: itarat pramāṇaṃ nāsti, ato tāvannaiva sidhyati bāhyo 'rthaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:540: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
T03kamvchtu:541: addhaitasvabhāvatāyā asaṃviditatvāt, anyathā na ko 'pi tattvadraṣṭā syāt |
T03kamvchtu:543: nanvevaṃ kathaṃ saṃkleśavyavadāne syātāmiti cet? na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha
T03kamvchtu:547: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate |
T03kamvchtu:549: avidyādau vicāreṇa tṛṣṇānivṛttau vyavadānam, tato vipakṣabhūtalakṣaṇam avicāraikaramaṇīyamupapadyate, tadā paramārthato vastvabhāvena kathaṃ tayorapyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:551: teṣvevāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, na tu saṃvṛtitaḥ pratītyasamutpādavādiṣu |
T03kamvchtu:552: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
T03kamvchtu:554: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam, gaganāravindavat
T03kamvchtu:555: parairiṣṭāḥ sarve jñānajñeyātmakāḥ bhāvākārāḥ, ekānekasvabhāvaśūnyā ityato vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ, ekānekābhyāṃ vyāptatvāt svabhāvasya |
T03kamvchtu:562: nānekatvamapi, tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
T03kamvchtu:564: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran |
T03kamvchtu:571: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:573: atha syāt- vijñānaṃ tvekameva, mithyākārāṇāṃ tatrāvabhāsyamānatvānna nānātvadoṣa iti cet? sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:575: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti
T03kamvchtu:576: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate, prakāśātmalakṣaṇatvād vijñānasya |
T03kamvchtu:578: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
T03kamvchtu:582: (mithyākārarasya) satyākārātmani (sākārātmani) jñāne kathaṃ niyamenāabhāsaḥ syāt, tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti |
T03kamvchtu:588: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā |
T03kamvchtu:594: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam |
T03kamvchtu:598: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet |
T03kamvchtu:599: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
T03kamvchtu:601: dātavyam, na tu vastupratiṣṭhitena ityayamartho 'tra yuktisaṅgataḥ |
T03kamvchtu:602: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra |
T03kamvchtu:603: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam, tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā, ata eva na
T03kamvchtu:608: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:609: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam
T03kamvchtu:610: dharmaḥ ityanena śabdena dharmāyatanaṃ parigṛhyate, āyatanena prapañcaḥ abhivyajyate, ataścakṣurādīni ādhyātmikāyatanāni nocyante |
T03kamvchtu:611: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte, yathā ityādyuktam |
T03kamvchtu:612: nimittaṃ tu vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ vānutpādādi, tasyodgrahaṇaṃ saṃjñā |
T03kamvchtu:614: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam |
T03kamvchtu:618: pratiṣidhyate, evaṃ pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate, tenātitarāṃ samprasādo janyate, na tu deya-dāyaka-pratigrāhakānupalambhe pratiṣṭhitatvena, evaṃ

T03kamvchtu:909: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:912: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ
T03kamvchtu:913: vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti |
T03kamvchtu:914: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti (Vajraṭ_144) vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ |
T03kamvchtu:915: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam |
T03kamvchtu:916: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti? na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto? iti paripṛcchā, etadarthamatra buddhadharmāḥ ityuktam |
T03kamvchtu:917: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:919: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:921: paramārthato 'nutpannatvād abuddhadharmā iti, saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
T03kamvchtu:923: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate |
T03kamvchtu:926: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno 'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ |

T03kamvchtu:930: pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,. tasyāṃ vyavasthāpyate |
T03kamvchtu:931: nāstyasyāyaṃ vipākabhedaḥ, na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanāpi |
T03kamvchtu:935: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena
T03kamvchtu:940: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate |
T03kamvchtu:945: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno 'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena |
T03kamvchtu:946: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate
T03kamvchtu:948: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni |
T03kamvchtu:962: anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate, na sa bodhisattva iti? evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ
T03kamvchtu:963: bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle 'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo 'bhavam,'; yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt |
T03kamvchtu:966: asyāyamatra sāmānyato 'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ, teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati, kiṃ khalu punaḥ ubhayanairātmyādhigamena prahīṇaniravaśeṣāvaraṇānāmiti |
T03kamvchtu:967: tasmin kāle 'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ
T03kamvchtu:969: | tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum |
T03kamvchtu:972: prāptaḥ, darśanapraheyasamastakleśaprahāyakaḥ srota āpanna iti, tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:976: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate |

T03kamvchtu:979: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato 'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ) āpannaḥ ityāha |
T03kamvchtu:981: anena tāvat paramārthata phaladvaividhyasyāprāpyatvamapi nirdiśyate, tathā
T03kamvchtu:982: hi-phalabhūtaṃ prāpyasvabhāvaṃ kiñcit syāt (tarhi) saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ vā syāt |
T03kamvchtu:983: tatra tāvadanutpannamevāsaṃkṛtam, abhāvarūpatvād śaśaviṣāṇamiva tanna yujyate (Vajraṭ_148) prāptum, aprāptyavasthāviśiṣṭatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:984: saṃskṛtaṃ tāvat kṣaṇikam, utpādasamanantaraṃ vināśitvāt, sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate |
T03kamvchtu:985: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate, na tu paramārthataḥ |
T03kamvchtu:986: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt |
T03kamvchtu:987: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt, bhinnakālikastu ekasmin pratyāsanne 'parasya cāsaṃnihite sati (bhavati), tatkathaṃ dvayoḥ sthitiriti |
T03kamvchtu:988: na ca samakālāvasthitayorubhayoḥ parasparopakārakatvam, asati copakāre prāpyaprāpakabhāvo naivopayujyate, atiprasaṅgatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:990: yujyate, tathā hi- ye 'mūrtabhāvāḥ, te naiva saṃyujyante,
T03kamvchtu:992: na syāt prāpyaprāpakabhāve samakālatvamātramapi teṣām, atiprasaṅgāt |
T03kamvchtu:994: sādhāraṇatvāt, idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī |
T03kamvchtu:996: tāvanmūrtāḥ, teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate, ekadeśena
T03kamvchtu:998: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne 'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt |
T03kamvchtu:1002: dharmāḥ iti dharmāyatanam, anenāsaṃskṛtamapi saṃgṛhyate, dharmāyatanasya
T03kamvchtu:1003: saptadravyātmakatvāt, śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā
T03kamvchtu:1006: evaṃ yataḥ paramārthataḥ sa kañcit (dharmaṃ) nāpannaḥ, mayā prāptamityapi na manyate,
T03kamvchtu:1008: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha |
T03kamvchtu:1009: mayā iti yasyāhamityabhiniveśaḥ syāttasya nāstyātmadṛṣṭiprahāṇam, yaścāprahīṇātmadṛṣṭiḥ sa anutpannāryamārgaḥ, yaścānutpannāryamārgaḥ, sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1010: evaṃ hi 'mayā iti yo 'yamabhiniveśaḥ, sa ātmadṛṣṭisamudayaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1013: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha |
T03kamvchtu:1018: yadā samastatraidhātukāvacarakleśamalānāṃ prahāṇaṃ jāyate, tadā sa sakalalokapujyatvād arhannityucyate |
T03kamvchtu:1019: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhannāma
T03kamvchtu:1020: prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt, santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ, samāropita evāsāvityabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1021: sāmpratam āryasubhūtiḥ 'ahaṃ'; padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi'; ityanenoktvā cittapragrahamātraṃ darśayituṃ aham ityādyavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1022: araṇā iti samādhiviśeṣaḥ, atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu
T03kamvchtu:1023: raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate |
T03kamvchtu:1024: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1027: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā
T03kamvchtu:1028: srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham, kiṃ khalu punaḥ ubhatobhāgavimuktenārhatā prāpyamaraṇāvihāritvamityabhisandhiḥ
T03kamvchtu:1029: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1030: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo 'sthitaḥ, sa evāraṇāvihārīti dvirabhidhānam, nāpara ityarthaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1031: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1032: | ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena, atha kathamiti cet? vyavahāramātrābhiniveśatayā, etacca prāgeva mayā proktam |
T03kamvchtu:1034: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1035: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ? atha nodgṛhīta iti ced? tadāsmābhirdharmamudgrahītukāmaiḥ kathamārādhanīstathāgatotpāda iti ye parikalpayanti teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
T03kamvchtu:1037: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1038: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma, yathoktaṃ pūrvam
T03kamvchtu:1039: 'sarve dharmāḥ prakṛtyā śāntāḥ'; (Vajraṭ_152) tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate, ataḥ śrutaparyeṣaṇaṃ saphalam |
T03kamvchtu:1040: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ'; ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1042: asti sa kaścid dharmo dīpaṅkarasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti diṅmātrābhidhānena udgṛhītadharmasya sarvanimittaṃ vinivartate |
T03kamvchtu:1043: 'nāsti sa kaścid dharma udgṛhītaḥ'; ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ
T03kamvchtu:1047: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ praṇidadhatīti tarkayatāṃ teṣāṃ hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāvibandhasaṃyogārthaṃ
T03kamvchtu:1051: kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛcchāyaṃ kṣetravyūhāḥ
T03kamvchtu:1054: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho 'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te, tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti |
T03kamvchtu:1057: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha |
T03kamvchtu:1058: evam iti yathoktena vidhinā, kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra
T03kamvchtu:1061: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1065: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete |
T03kamvchtu:1066: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ, sthānasyāsya audāryaṃ ca paridīpitam |
T03kamvchtu:1068: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve 'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ? anyathā sattvaparipākārthaṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ pravarteran? iti yo vicāraḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1069: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam |
T03kamvchtu:1073: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāpṛṣṭam |
T03kamvchtu:1074: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti |
T03kamvchtu:1077: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena, na tu paramārthataḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1080: tasmāttathocyate, anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1081: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha
T03kamvchtu:1082: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt?';
T03kamvchtu:1084: anyathā patamārthataḥ kasyacidapyātmabhāvasyāsiddheḥ kimityātmabhāva ihocyate, tato
T03kamvchtu:1086: niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti, tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet?
T03kamvchtu:1087: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe |
T03kamvchtu:1090: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite |
T03kamvchtu:1091: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1093: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha |
T03kamvchtu:1094: (Vajraṭ_155) anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ
T03kamvchtu:1097: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti |
T03kamvchtu:1098: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti |
T03kamvchtu:1099: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti |
T03kamvchtu:1100: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti |
T03kamvchtu:1101: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitam-
T03kamvchtu:1104: |- (Vajraṭ_156) tatraudāryaṃ tu vastubhedasaṃbāhulyam, yadāha tāvato lokadhātūn iti |
T03kamvchtu:1105: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti |
T03kamvchtu:1109: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate |
T03kamvchtu:1111: tatra arhadbhyaḥ ityanena prahāṇasampad darśitā, hatakleśāritvād niruktyā 'arhan';
T03kamvchtu:1117: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam |
T03kamvchtu:1118: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1121: bhāṣyeta iti ātmanā granthasvādhyāyaḥ, samprakāśyeta iti parebhyaḥ samyak
T03kamvchtu:1123: caityabhūtyabhūtaḥ iti vandanīyaḥ, caitya eva caityabhūtaḥ vaśībhūta
T03kamvchtu:1125: jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1126: udgṛhya iti padam, dhārayiṣyanti ityavismaraṇam, vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam
T03kamvchtu:1128: anena tāvad śrutamayaprajñayā dhāraṇaṃ darśitam, cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha |

T03kamvchtu:1132: śāstā ........ sthānīyaḥ iti dharmabhāṇakaḥ, śāstṛkṛtyakaraṇāt, sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1133: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1140: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite |
T03kamvchtu:1141: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam |
T03kamvchtu:1142: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān |- (Vajraṭ_158) kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate |
T03kamvchtu:1143: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate |
T03kamvchtu:1145: pāramadhigamya paricchedayatītyapi pāramiteti, prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1146: athavā prajñāyāḥ pāraṃ prajñāpāram, anayā tadadhigamya paricchidyate 'tastathocyate |
T03kamvchtu:1147: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam |
T03kamvchtu:1149: sā ca yathoktā prajñaiva, na tvanyat tatpāragamanāsambhavāt |
T03kamvchtu:1152: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ? itio pṛṣṭavān |
T03kamvchtu:1153: yaiva subhūte, prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā sā ityudatarat |
T03kamvchtu:1154: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā, tathāpi
T03kamvchtu:1156: sa vikalpo 'pi prakṛtyā bhrāntaḥ, atastena samāropita ākāro 'pi mithyaiva |
T03kamvchtu:1157: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā, sā śabdena vyutpādyamānā apāramitaiva, na tu tathāgatasya prajñā,
T03kamvchtu:1158: satyasaṃvṛtyā jñeyasya pāraṅgatatvāttasyāḥ, anyathā kathaṃ bhagavān
T03kamvchtu:1160: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate, ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate |
T03kamvchtu:1162: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate, paramārthato 'pāraṅgatatvāttasyāḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1163: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1164: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
T03kamvchtu:1165: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā, tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmasiddhatvāt, siddheṣvapi svalakṣaṇasyāsādhāraṇatvena saṅketena
T03kamvchtu:1166: sāmānyalakṣaṇameva tāvat prajñapyamānatvāt, svasāmānyalakṣaṇe vyatiricya aparasyābhidheyasyābhāvāt parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāttayoḥ, ata eva ca paramārthataḥ 'nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ'; iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan, nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1167: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1169: evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ vistareṇa darśitam, tathāpi ye tāvad
T03kamvchtu:1170: ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
T03kamvchtu:1173: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate |
T03kamvchtu:1175: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate
T03kamvchtu:1179: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti |
T03kamvchtu:1182: te ca paramāṇavo 'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1183: (tarhiṃ) kathaṃ tad bahu rajaḥ? iti pravādināmāśayamabhilakṣya kasya
T03kamvchtu:1186: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo 'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva
T03kamvchtu:1189: tāvadekatvagrahaṇopāyamātram, na tu paramārtham, tenocyate pṛthivīraja iti
T03kamvchtu:1190: | tad yuktaṃ saṃvṛtau sattvāt, anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1191: udbhāvanāsaṃvṛtyāpi tasya deśanaṃ na yujyate, tadīyānyatarātmasvabhāvasya apratibhāsamānatvāt
T03kamvchtu:1193: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate
T03kamvchtu:1195: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo 'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha |
T03kamvchtu:1197: adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1198: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ, śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva |
T03kamvchtu:1199: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1202: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe |
T03kamvchtu:1203: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā |
T03kamvchtu:1204: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam |
T03kamvchtu:1205: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1208: bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ) avināśikāyo na pūrayati
T03kamvchtu:1210: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi |
T03kamvchtu:1211: sāmānyato 'trāyaṃ saṅgrahārthaḥ, tathāgatapūjāsatkāreṣu lakṣaṇasampadā tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ, atha kathamiti cet?
T03kamvchtu:1216: darśitaḥ, adhunā tathāgatapūjāsatkāraprasaṅge darśitatvād bhinna eva (rūpakāyaḥ) |
T03kamvchtu:1217: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite |
T03kamvchtu:1222: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe 'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ kausīdyalābhasatkārapiṇḍapātānuraktā teṣāṃ
T03kamvchtu:1224: sūbhūte, strī vā puruṣo vā ityādi |
T03kamvchtu:1225: anena cāsāre 'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam, tadantarāyakaratvāttasmin kāyajīvite nirapekṣacittatayā sarvātmanāsmin (dharmaparyāye) yogaḥ karaṇīya iti paridipitam |
T03kamvchtu:1227: | tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe |
T03kamvchtu:1231: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam |
T03kamvchtu:1232: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1237: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā
T03kamvchtu:1240: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1244: pudgalanairātmyamātraśuddhajñānena, parameṇa te āścaryeṇaṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
T03kamvchtu:1245: bhūtasaṃjñām ityaviparītārthasaṃjñām, na tu śabdābhiniveśenedaṃ bhūtatvamiti saṃjñā |
T03kamvchtu:1246: evamatra paramārthabhipretya sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ nirdiṣṭam, na tu saṃvṛtim, niḥsvabhāvatāyā abhāvāttatra |
T03kamvchtu:1248: nanu bhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ, saṃjñāyā api sattvaṃ paramārthataḥ syāt,
T03kamvchtu:1249: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta, tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1251: saṃjñānāma na kācana, ekānekasvabhāvena viyogāt, paramārthataḥ sā asaṃjñaiva |
T03kamvchtu:1252: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
T03kamvchtu:1253: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate
T03kamvchtu:1255: tataḥ paramārthavyavasthāyāṃ kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam, kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
T03kamvchtu:1257: teṣu kusīdeṣvevāścaryotpādanārtham na mama bhagavan, āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi, adhimucye, ye 'pi te bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1258: sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime (Vajraṭ_165) samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan, dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyanti,
T03kamvchtu:1259: dhārayiṣyanti, paryavāpsyanti, te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ityāha |
T03kamvchtu:1260: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ- anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye
T03kamvchtu:1261: bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti, na te pudgalādibhirgṛhītā
T03kamvchtu:1264: tatra 'aham'; iti padgalanairātmyaṃ bodhyate, imaṃ ityanena pudgaladharmanairātmyaṃ prakāśyate, bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā, avakalpayāmi iti prasādākāraḥ prasannatā
T03kamvchtu:1265: saṃdarśyate, adhimucye iti sampratyayaśca, te sattvāḥ ityanena bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1268: taccaivaṃ nirucyate- pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt śravaṇabalena yaddhi nairātmyadvayapratipādake 'smin dharme prasādasampratyayamātraṃ jātaṃ tannaivāścaryam ye bhagavan (teṣu)
T03kamvchtu:1274: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam
T03kamvchtu:1276: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1277: ātmā ityādivacanam, tūpalakṣaṇam, atasteṣāṃ dharmasaṃjñā (api) na
T03kamvchtu:1279: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭvā ātmasaṃjñā ityudatārīt |
T03kamvchtu:1281: tasyā api parikṣākṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā |
T03kamvchtu:1283: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1287: paramārthataḥ kasyāpi saṃjñeyasyābhāvāt, na kutrāpi te saṃjñā pravartate,
T03kamvchtu:1290: anyathā kathaṃ tatpadaṃ prāpnuyuḥ, tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam |
T03kamvchtu:1291: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate
T03kamvchtu:1292: (Vajraṭ_167) evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam
T03kamvchtu:1295: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha
T03kamvchtu:1297: bhagavatā dharmamātramidaṃ pudgalāsattvamityuktam, mahāyāne tu tadapi
T03kamvchtu:1302: dharmanairātmyadeśanāśravaṇakāle santrasiṣyanti, yad dharmamātraṃ tasyāpyasattve 'aho ! na mayā bhāvyam'; iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi
T03kamvchtu:1303: śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam |
T03kamvchtu:1307: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1308: sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante, apare tu trividhastrāsaḥ śravaṇa-manana-bhāvanākāle bhavatītyabhyupagacchanti |
T03kamvchtu:1309: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti |'; śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat |
T03kamvchtu:1313: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā, (Vajraṭ_168) api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam |
T03kamvchtu:1317: asmābhiḥ sarvaiḥ paramā saṃsādhitā syāt, kathaṃ na (vayaṃ)
T03kamvchtu:1318: parameṇāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyāmaḥ? anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1319: dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate, tathā hi- dharmo 'yaṃ (etāvān)
T03kamvchtu:1320: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate
T03kamvchtu:1323: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite 'pi ye duḥkhe 'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ
T03kamvchtu:1325: apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi |
T03kamvchtu:1327: kṣāntirjñāyate? tasyāḥ ya ākāraḥ, yathā vākāraḥ, yaścākṣānteḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'nena sthānena darśyate |
T03kamvchtu:1329: sarvadharmānupalambhasvabhāvaḥ, ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam
T03kamvchtu:1330: paramārthataḥ kā kṣāntiḥ, yena kṣāntiḥ, yatra
T03kamvchtu:1331: kṣāntiḥ, yaśca kṣamyaḥ, yā ca kṣāntiḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanupalambhāt (Vajraṭ_169) saiva apāramitā
T03kamvchtu:1332: evaṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1333: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam |
T03kamvchtu:1334: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha |
T03kamvchtu:1336: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā iti paradehasaṃjñā, śastrasaṃjñā, chedasaṃjñā, parasaṃjñā,
T03kamvchtu:1339: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet? tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha |
T03kamvchtu:1341: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1344: yatra ātmasaṃjñā, tatra nūnaṃ tanmatreṇātmasneho jāyate |
T03kamvchtu:1346: tenaivaṃ ya ātmopakāritvenopādattāsteṣvātmīyatvaṃ parikalpyate, itareṣu ca paratvaṃ
T03kamvchtu:1354: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante || iti ||
T03kamvchtu:1355: yatra vyāpādādidoṣaustatra kathaṃ kṣāntivādīti prasetsyati, yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam |
T03kamvchtu:1359: atra kaliṅgarājā ityanena apakāramarṣaṇakṣāntiḥ paridīpitā, aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ |
T03kamvchtu:1360: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti |
T03kamvchtu:1363: tatkathamasmābhirna bhāvanīyā, duṣkarakarmaṇyananuṣṭhite durlabhapadaṃ nādhigamyate'; iti vicārayanti |
